task: Develop a basic 'Tetris' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Consider different fading systems'.
name: FadeShift Blocks

branding_data.short_description: A unique twist on the classic Tetris game with dynamic fading blocks.
branding_data.detailed_description: FadeShift Blocks takes the timeless mechanics of Tetris and introduces an innovative fading system. As you stack and clear lines, the blocks don't just vanish instantly; they gradually fade away, adding a new layer of strategy. Players must consider the timing of fades to optimize their space and score. The game challenges you to adapt to the ever-changing visibility of the blocks, making each move more critical and engaging. The fading system is designed to create a visually captivating experience while maintaining the addictive gameplay of the original Tetris.
